name: Porkstruction Derby
description:
Ever wanted to be a pig with a fancy hat?
Me neither.

But now you have the occasion!
BUT WAIT

Another pig has a hat like yours!

Fight him.
In a Snout to Snout destruction derby. 

NOW IS THE TIME!

Controls:

Red Hat Pig- WASD
Blue Hat Pig-Arrow Keys
Controller will be added in future!
Pause Screen- Esc

The game will receive continuous updates!
